import React ,{useState} from 'react' import './css/MessagePannel.css' import MessageSenderLayout from './MessageSenderLayout' import {Row ,Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import MessageReceiveLayout from './MessageReceiveLayout' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { updateMessageQueue } from '../../../features/Messages' import SendBtn from './SendBtn' const MessagePannel = ({socket}) => { const cur_usr = useSelector(state => state.user.profile.username); const [messageQueue,setMessageQueue] = useState([]); // #message receive lisitener socket.on("message", ({sender ,sendTo ,message ,sumited_at})=>{ setMessageQueue([...messageQueue , ]) console.log(message) }) return (
) } export default MessagePannel
